Example 10.3 (MNIST Digits Embedding)
Figure 10.10
Embedding of
MNIST digits 0
(blue) and 1
(orange) in a
two-dimensional
principal subspace
using PCA. Four
embeddings of the
digits “0” and “1” in
the principal
subspace are
highlighted in red
with their
corresponding
original digit.
Figure 10.10 visualizes the training data of the MMIST digits “0” and “1”
